> <OLD>
>
> Tucson turns his head sharply at Dark Rodimus with a scowl and a show of his
> teeth, followed by a deep throated hiss.   To him ge was the enemy and he.
> Could not wait to face him head on.  Perhaps this would be a good time to
> figure out if he was the real deal or actually a clone.  All he would have
> to do is attempt to open his chest to find out.  So in a savage yet
> strategic manner he turns back to Magmatron, with a different expression on
> his face.  If he played the part he may find out exactly what he needed to
> know.
>
> " On second thought, Lord Magmatron, if I may request so, perhaps I could
> have A few rounds with Dark Rodimus?  You may just like what you see and
> perhaps we may be able to strike some sort of bargain.  Before you stands
> two warriors, one of self doubt and lack of self confidence, and the other,
> steadfast, bold, strong, confident and outgoing. I'm sure you would rather
> chose the warrior who is much more like me than him. Let me prove myself
> worthy and then we will talk again soon afterwards."
>
> He them bows on his own.
>
> " besides, a dragon is far more formidable than a warrior."

<NEW>

There is a searching gaze from MAGMATRON as he turned his powerful
optics on TUSCON then a powerful laughter. Perhaps nopt as loud as
TUSCON's, but enough to fill the chamber with his own sound. "Bravo
silver dragon, bravo!"

Stepping down to the floor level with SABERBACK and DARK RODIMUS right
behind him he walked up to TUSCON his smile fading as he descended.

"You will have your battle." MAGAMTRON said with a warrior's tone, his
voice turning deadly serious as he stood looking at TUSCON, still
taller than he by nearly two feet even being on ground level, and his
shoulders were wide and large indicating large amounts of strength and
endurance.

Again with the searching gaze from MAGMATRON on TUSCON, his body tense
and ready, "But not yet." He said finally. "This is not the proper
venue for any battle." He said, his voice deep and cool. Before you
fight my dark knight you must prove your worth. Prove yourself worthy
and you shall have it."

Behind MAGMATRON the dark form of RODIMUS stood, his optics glowing
with internal light and energy, even the flame on his chest semeed to
glow eerily. He bowed to TUSCON without taking his optics off of him,
proper warrior's ettiquette. "When the time comes, we shall meet."

MAGMATRON nodded, "Quite." He said. "But now, to the pens with you
Tuscon." He laughed again, his seeming mercurial personality going
from utter seriousness to humor. "Your first battle will begin soon
enough, prepare yourself."

GUILEDART came up to TUSCON, "Come on." he said with a little more
respect. Evidently the way MAGMATRON treated TUSCON granted him a
level of respect from the soldier . . . but not too much, HARDHEAD and
HYDRA still had their weapons on him.

He was being herded out of the room.

(TAG)

Preston
